content.rendered:
Transaction rules

General Rules:

Dear All Vendors And Buyers!

Welcome To Dragon Market, A Reputable And Safe Place For You To Trade And Buy / Sell All Reputable Illegal Items On The Internet.

“You Will Receive What You Have Sent” – It Is The Most Important Principle If You Want To Trade At This Place!

Registration:

You Can Sign Up For A Free Account In The Shortest Time By Visiting The Page My Account

Benefits Of Becoming Our Member:

  • Speed ​​up Your Way Through Payment
  • Track Your Order Easily
  • Keep A Record Of All Your Purchases
  • Exchange And Trade With Items You Can Offer To Get Your Money Back
  • Be Protected In All Transactions On Our System With Ultimate Security Services

Deposit / Withdraw / Payment:

Deposits:

You Can Deposit Money Into Your Account To Facilitate Trading On The System. We Offer The Most Convenient And Safe Payment Methods Today Including: Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Cash, Dash, Vertcoin, Monero, Ethereum And Western Union. All Balances In The Account Are For Purchases And Will Not Be Withdrawn Except Under Special Circumstances We Consider After Discussion.

Withdrawal:

We Only Consider Withdrawing Money From Accounts To Vendors.

Payment:

You Can Make Payments Using The Balance In Your Wallet Account Or You Can Pay Directly Using The Methods We Have Recommended And Supporting.

We Propose And Hope All Transactions Will Be Done By Escrow Service From Our System.

Upgrade To Vendor:

The Initial Cost To Upgrade To A Vendor Account Is €5000 / Or By Products That Have Been Confirmed By Our Product Support Team.

This Money Is Used To Guarantee The Services You Will Provide In The Future For Our Customers. It Will Be Kept Carefully And Refunded As Soon As You Want To Terminate The Services On Our System.

In Addition, We Charge Between €100 And €150 Per Month From The Second Month Depending On The Service You Want To Provide. Details Are Clear Below:

  • Hacking & Carding Services: €100 / Month
  • Drugs Dealer: €150 / Month

Vendor Rules:

Please Make The Trading Reputation And Quickly Be Appreciated From Us. Make Your Customers Satisfied!

All Personal Private Information And Personal Contact Information Will Be Removed, We Are Only Interested In Transactions On This Store.

We Require All Products To Be Free Shipping To Customers; If The Supplier Wants To Receive Shipping Charges, Please Include Them In The Product Price!

Buyer Rules:

Become A Smart Buyer By Reading And Understanding Product Information Carefully Before You Want To Make Deals To Vendors. Also, Customers Are Our Special Care And Protection Subjects, So You Can Shop Safely Here.

Report Abuse:

Contact To Support Team
Email: drugondeepweb@protonmail.com

This Is Just The Original Rule, It Will Be Amended From Time To Time, We Will Have Attached Notice As Soon As There Is A Change.

Updated: 6/16/2020
